attributes.comment:
I firmly disapprove the hike in fees by USCIS. I am an alien working on H1B for
many years, waiting for retrogression to end. At the rate at which green cards
are allocated to people from India and China, it will take a decade before I see
a GC allocated to me. There is a need for immediate legislation to allow people
working legally under visas and who are well educated, to get GCs faster. If
the GCs are delayed, then people like me will be in queue for a long long time.
Any fee increase will adversely affect me and my aspirations to live in this
country, to which I am contributing immensely with my knowledge and skills.

Please do not hike any fee at this moment.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
